title: Do I need LP to get the Gold Border?
body: I’m currently Gold V with 0LP and someone told me I need LP to get the border? Is this true?

replies.body:
You don't need lp at the rank to get a border in the loading game screen or your profile...

I'm not sure if riot is doing the different divisions of a rank i.e gold 5 vs gold 4 having different loading screen borders with the size of the 'dots'.

Well... What badge does it display on your profile? It's a Gold badge. Not a Silver badge. Even if you're on 0 LP, you're no longer Silver. You earned Gold. 

TL;DR - You will get a border
thank you :3 people were scaring me telling me I needed Lp...
The only division where you can't get a border unless you have LP is Challenger, where the cut off in OCE at the moment is ~200 LP
